baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，作如是意：『遮比丘尼僧，不出迦絺那衣，欲令久得五事放捨。』波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 110

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṁ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 29

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber in der unsicheren Erwartung von Robenmaterial die Zeit überschreitet, welche die rechte Robenzeit ist, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni let the robe-season (the period for receiving kathina-donations) pass on the basis of a weak expectation for cloth, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang membiarkan musim jubah (periode menerima dana Kathina) berlalu atas dasar sebuah pengharapan yang lemah untuk kain jubah, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼遮捨迦絺那衣。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 185

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。所望得衣弱。而受迦絺那衣。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 135

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼不共出羯恥那衣者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 146
